Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Melee attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

You show your foes just what it's like being helpless and alone. Make a melee attack. If successful, you deal an additional [[4d6]] damage. Additionally, make an Escape Artist check with a DC equal to the target's CMD. If successful, your foe is entangled and rooted to their current position and cannot move for [[1d4]] rounds. Exploit: The target cannot treat any creature as an ally for a number of rounds equal to your initiation modifier. You do not need to succeed at the Escape Artist check to use this exploit.
